parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: IsDefaultRule
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query system rules.

>  This parameter is deprecated.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese.
*   **en**: English.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: RuleType
parameters.description:
The rule type. Valid values:

*   1: system rule
*   2: user-defined rule
